text: Enhen hidayat per laa khara kerna teray zimmay nahi bulkay hidayat Allah Taalaa deta hai jissay chahata hai aur tum jo bhali cheez Allah ki raah mein do gay uss ka faeeda khud pao gay. Tumhen sirf Allah ki raza mandi ki talab kay liye hi kharach kerna chahaiye tum jo kuch maal kharach kero gay uss ka poora poora badla umhen diya jaye ga aur tumhara haq na maara jaye ga
